mapper.select: select urm.*,um.menu_type from ua_role_menu urm left join ua_menu um on urm.menu_id = um.id and um.menu_type != '0' where urm.role_id = #{roleId} and urm.del_flag = '1' and um.del_flag = '1'

update.foreach: update ua_role_menu set del_flag = ${roleMenu.delFlag} where menu_id = #{roleMenu.menuId} and role_id = #{roleMenu.roleId}

mapper.update: update ua_role_menu set del_flag = '0' where role_id = #{roleId}
